title: Wilson's Tales of the Borders and of Scotland, Volume 10
author: Various
snippet: From hence KingDavid proceeded to Airdrie, or Ard-rhi--a name which in the Celticlanguage denotes "the king's height"--then a favourite royalhunting-station on the borders of Kingsmuir; and, returning to Crail,the Runic Cross was not forgotten.[9]

title: Wilson's Tales of the Borders and of Scotland, Volume 10
author: Various
snippet: From hence KingDavid proceeded to Airdrie, or Ard-rhi--a name which in the Celticlanguage denotes "the king's height"--then a favourite royalhunting-station on the borders of Kingsmuir; and, returning to Crail,the Runic Cross was not forgotten.[9]

title: The Importance of Being Seven
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: The Nuer and the residents of Airdrie are indeed quite different – both groups have considerable merits, and rich traditions – but for Domenica the Nuer had the slight edge in terms of anthropological interest.

title: The Importance of Being Seven
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: So while investigations into familial structures amongst the Nuer might be all very interesting – though not necessarily for the Nuer themselves, to whom all this was just the way they did things – in the eyes of those who dispensed academic largesse it was not quite as compelling as a study of job centre accessibility in Airdrie.

title: The journal of Sir Walter Scott,
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: 1 The Right Hon. Sir W. Alex- 1824 ; died in London in his eighty- ander of Airdrie, called to the eighth year, 1842.

title: Memoirs of the life of Sir Walter Scott,
author: Lockhart, J. G.
snippet: It is high to hear these young fellows talk of the Raid of Airdrie, the trot of Kilmarnock, and so on, like so many moss-troopers.

title: Traced and Tracked; or, Memoirs of a City Detective, etc
author: Macgovan, James.
snippet: TheGlasgow brogue was strong in her tongue, but not strong enough,and I soon heard her say that she had come from Airdrie,which accounted for the slight difference in the accent.
